tweet:
just shipped openclaw auto-install + onboarding. no more config hell.

run the script -> environment ready.
branding & docs polished too.

less time configuring, more time building.
alt_tweet: openclaw integration is live. landing page, docs, and a setup script that actually handles the heavy lifting. run it once, start shipping.
image_prompt: Dynamic pixel art arcade scene. A lime green (#ecf874) claw machine (OpenClaw) successfully grabbing a pixelated box labeled 'SETUP'. The Pollinations bee mascot cheering with victory pose. Warm pastel background, glowing neon accents, pixel confetti. Text 'AUTO-EQUIP' in chunky 8-bit font. Cozy, nostalgic, but energetic victory moment.
reasoning: Directly addresses a common developer pain point (configuration) and offers an immediate solution. The 'shipped' framing builds credibility by showing actual progress.
